description: This is a remaster of one of the first game I ever had as a kid with my GBA, Portal is also a very good game mixing these two universes what a weird but cool idea and it is well done it looks like the original game and you can customize each characters (max 4 players in the same game) I enjoyed and recommend this game ! Thanks to the devs

For a Mario platformer especially, the stabyourself.net start screen is annoying and the “shader (scanline-4x) is ”[F word]“ed up, yo” from the program's output is not welcome.
Also, audio didn't work. Maybe this is because I turned off the “Access files in your home folder” permission? (xdg-desktop-portal is better for file access, BTW)
Also, couldn't find a fullscreen option. If it's there it's hard to find. There are more issues but this is a good summary IMO.
